item.title: T-Mobile CEO sends Apple iPhone message after launch
item.description: The un-carrier's CEO had surprising words on the iPhone 17.

item.title: 'Fastest-growing' restaurant chain files for Chapter 7 bankruptcy
item.description: A Chapter 7 bankruptcy filing is a surprise move for the chain, which had grown to over 100 locations.

item.title: Big tech companies hit by H-1B visa nightmare
item.description: A new H-1B visa fee triggers warnings from tech leaders, immigration lawyers, and economists.

item.title: Costco recalls Kirkland food nationwide over deadly illness risk
item.description: Costco recalls Kirkland product sold in 33 states due to potential listeria contamination.

item.title: McDonaldâ€™s brings a foreign fan-favorite to U.S. consumers
item.description: McDonald's finally adds a popular international item to its U.S. menu to win back customers amid declines.
